text: Not 100percent sure that it is his wallet,  but that is crazy if true

The wallet presumed to be associated with [Justin Sun](https://x.com/justinsuntron)  just longed 7.3M XPL ($4.5M) in 16 seconds, causing XPL to wick up 11% to $0.65. 

He is now long 32.2M XPL ($19.5M).
